headline: CarMax price target raised to $103 from $99 at RBC Capital
summary: RBC Capital analyst Steven Shemesh raised the firm’s price target on CarMax (KMX) to $103 from $99 and keeps an Outperform rating on the shares after its Q3 earnings beat. Retail comp used unit sales increased 4.3% – higher that 3.2% consensus – the second consecutive quarter of positive comps, which was driven by average selling prices declining 3.9% to $26,153, the analyst tells investors in a research note. Between retail unit momentum and cost discipline, it’d be tough not to feel marginally
